text: Helmut Newton (born Helmut Neustädter; 31 October 1920 – 23 January 2004) was a German-Australian photographer. The New York Times described him as a "prolific, widely imitated fashion photographer whose provocative, erotically charged black-and-white photos were a mainstay of Vogue and other publications." ==See also== *Isabel Sarli *Glenn Youngkin *Arne Duncan *Lloyd Doggett *Charlie Baker *Bobby Jindal *William Bonner *Bob McDonnell *John Boehner *Donald Carcieri *Robert P. Reed *Richard Neal *Keren Woodward Category:1920 births Category:2004 deaths Category:German photographers Category:Australian photographers
title: Helmut Newton
